name: Robin K Philip
about_me: Passionate Machine Learning Engineer with a strong foundation in Python and expertise in building data-driven solutions, particularly for document understanding in healthcare. Proficient in OCR, computer vision, and multimodal models with hands-on experience in developing scalable and efficient ML models. Eager to apply skills in parsing key information from scanned documents, improving document quality, and building next-generation multimodal models to enhance document understanding performances at Autonomize AI.

achievements: Transformed raw data into actionable insights using Python, Scikit-learn, NumPy, and Pandas.
Designed and developed scalable ML models for various applications.
Focused on document understanding, including OCR and computer vision tasks.
Experience in parsing key information from scanned documents and improving document quality.
